item.title: Fully furnished LUXURY Condo with a big enclosed balcony & Parking (Hull) $1095 1bd
item.description:
1Br fully furnished LUXURY condo with a big enclosed balcony at Notre Dame Tower in Excellent Location at 285 rue Laurier, Gatineau, QC (Hull) is available for rent from July 1, 2012.

The condo is on the bank of the Ottawa River in front of Jacques-Cartier Park with panoramic view of the Ottawa River and the Rideau falls, parliament buildings up to the Casino and Lac Lemay. The building is located just opposite to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and NRC Sussex Drive, steps to Museum of Civilization and close to school, shopping malls, with caretaker, laundry and corner store on site.

Rent is $1095/mt including PARKING, ultramodern executive furniture, relaxing King size bed, fridge, stove, microwave, cutleries, water, hot water, High Speed Internet and Wireless, LCD flat TV with TV cable, phone with unlimited local calls (hydro extra), iron & ironing board, bed linen & towels, pots & pans and others.
Unbeatable!!! Great Place for living! Just Move In!

item.title: Spacious 3 BDR apt for rent with deck (Heat, Hydro, Water Inc) (127 Carillon Street) $1099 3bd 1000sqft
item.description:
We are renting a 3 bedroom apartment. The street address is 127 Carillon St., which is close to Montreal Rd and Beechwood village. Students from University of Ottawa or La Cite Collegiale are welcome to apply.

This 3-Bedroom apartment (Approx. 1000 sq. feet) is on the second floor with lots of storage space. You have a separate dining room along with the kitchen, laundry facility and a deck behind the dining room on the second floor. You can BBQ on the deck. There is brand new flooring for all 3 bedrooms, living room, dining room and bathroom. You will get 3 appliances (Brand new Stove, old fridge and a dishwasher). You are close to all major amenities, major OC Transpo bus routes, schools, La Cite Collegiale as well as Ottawa University. One parking spot is included in the rent and more available on request. The rent is $1099 which includes all the utilities (heat/hydro/water).

If you have any questions or would like to make an appointment please contact Sawan Goyal at 613 963 0333 or email at sawan_g@hotmail.com.

item.title: Spacious duplex with yards & garage in trendy area (Wellington Village/ Westboro) $1985 3bd 2500sqft
item.description:
This three-bedroom duplex offers a 1200 square-foot main floor and a 1300 square-foot basement in a traditional three-story brick home.

The duplex is located on a quiet residential street half a block from a grocery store, bakeries, cafes, shops, and some of Ottawa's best restaurants along Wellington Street West in Wellington Village. A major supermarket is four short blocks away. A short walk provides easy access to the Ottawa River Parkway and Island Park Drive recreational pathways.

The tenancy includes the use and enjoyment of the yards and gardens in the front and rear; maintenance of the grounds, including snow clearing, are the responsibility of the tenants. A new lawnmower, snow shovels, rake, garden shovel and hose are provided.

We are looking for a "good fit" i.e. quiet, responsible and preferably long-term tenants. No smoking and no dogs. References are mandatory.

Availability: July 1, 2012. Cost: $1,985 per month, heat and water included.

General amenities:
New front-load washer and dryer
New bottom-freezer refridgerator and stove
Large front porch plus rear porch
Low-maintenance perrennial gardens and yards in front and rear
Spacious and private back yard with patio
Driveway for four cars, single file
Oversized garage with two doors, automatic opener, workbench, cupboards and 60-amp electrical service
Certified by City of Ottawa for fire safety, including fire extinguishers and hard-wired smoke detectors
Four private entrances, including to basement bed-sitting room

Main Floor includes:
Two bedrooms with closets
Full hardwood floors
Private front and side entrances
Sliding doors to rear porch and yard
Newly renovated, spacious, premium bathroom
Diningroom, livingroom, and refurbished kitchen

Basement Level includes:
One large bed-sitting room with four windows and private entrance
One large recreation room with window
Brand new carpet and fresh paint throughout
Three storage rooms plus two large closets
Laundry/utility room with new front-load washer and dryer
Second bathroom with window and shower (dated but fully functional)
Low ceiling

Public Transit and Commuting:
The #2 and #16 bus routes are half a block away. Major bus service for five routes is 500 metres away on Holland Avenue connecting to the nearby transitway and to downtown. The Tunneys Pasture transitway station is a ten-minute walk away through residential streets. Access to the 417/Queensway is one kilometre away.

The landlords of this unit are two professionals who live in the neighbourhood. For more information contact Carla at 613.862.8854 or carlav@fcpc.ca
